text: Ī hinde, dhikkārigaḷa virud'dha tamage vijaya nīḍabēkendu prārthisuttidda adē mandi – idīga, allāhana kaḍeyinda, īgāgalē tam'ma baḷi iruva granthagaḷannu samarthisuva granthavu tam'ma baḷige bandiruvāga mattu tamage paricayaviruva satya granthavu tam'ma baḷige bandiruvāga, adannu dhikkarisuttiddāre. Dhikkārigaḷa mēle allāhana śāpavide
